column4: Hi, I have ssh in /etc/rc*.d but when i reboot it don't start
I have start it manually using sudo /etc/init.d/ssh start
Hi, I have ssh in /etc/rc*.d but when i reboot it don't start
I have start it manually using sudo /etc/init.d/ssh start

in /etc/rc3.d -- i think this is default boot level -- its S20ssh
